txt.en: 'I don't understand. He was so spry this morning, but now he will not budge. Perhaps he is thirsty... he did slow down this afternoon... before he stopped, of course.\n\n'I spotted a bucket as he and I passed across the Entwash, would you go fetch him some water?'
'What a splash that was! Hopefully, my journey will begin anew in just a moment!'
Rook is frustrated that his steed will not budge from this spot. He believes the avanc to be thirsty, so he wishes for you to fetch some water from the nearby Entwash.
The avanc has been drenched, but shows no sign of movement
Find a bucket and attempt to wake Rook's avanc
Rook wants you to attempt to wake his avanc so he can continue his journey to the East. \n\nHe mentioned seeing a bucket along the edge of the Entwash.
Rook can be found to the west of Snowbourn.
